resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

fields.description:
h3. Expected behavior
Navigate around the application without random crashes

h3. Actual behavior
Start to navigate around the app, and after some time (random) the app crash (random crash)

h3. Steps to reproduce
Open the app on the device, go to product, search for "jacket" , browse the information, go back, enter again, and again, eventually the app it's gonna crash

h3. Resources
I can't attach the project, because it's bigger than 10MB, please send me an email to attach the project

h3. Log Crashes
I'm attaching some log crashes
fields.summary: iOS: Application suddenly crash after navigate around views and tableviews
fields.environment:
Device: iPod Touch OS 5 / iPhone 4s OS 5
SDK: 1.8.0.1

comments.body: Neither we nor CE can reproduce this issue.
closing based on no-one being able to reproduce, including qe
